Name: Tech Madness
About the game: Yes, it's not cool when the sysadmin is left alone on a piece of forest cut off from the world. No, not alone, but alone with the crazed robots. But! It becomes cool if the sysadmin is given a rifle, a chance to fix all the system errors and restore the servers to stop this Tech Madness! Nice graphics, excellent atmosphere and uncomplicated plot - all ingenious simple! You take a rifle, look for parts to fix the radio tower and fix it - this is the whole simple, but ingenious Tech Madness!
